categories.name: Immigrant Visas
categories.description: For foreign nationals who intend to permanently reside in the Philippines

visaTypes.name: Immigrant Visa by Marriage (13A)
visaTypes.description: For foreign nationals married to Filipino citizens
minimumRequirements: Police clearance from country of origin

visaTypes.name: Returning Former Natural-Born Filipino Citizen (13G)
visaTypes.description: For former natural-born Filipino citizens who wish to return to the Philippines
minimumRequirements: Police clearance from country of residence

visaTypes.name: Returning Resident (13E)
visaTypes.description: For permanent residents returning to the Philippines after temporary absence
minimumRequirements: Proof of departure from the Philippines

visaTypes.name: Quota Visa (13)
visaTypes.description: For foreign nationals from countries with reciprocity agreements with the Philippines
minimumRequirements: Police clearance from country of origin

visaTypes.name: Permanent Resident Visa (PRV)
visaTypes.description: For foreign nationals who wish to permanently reside in the Philippines
minimumRequirements: Police clearance from country of origin

categories.name: Non-Immigrant Visas
categories.description: For foreign nationals who intend to stay temporarily in the Philippines

visaTypes.name: Temporary Visitor Visa (9A)
visaTypes.description: For foreign tourists or temporary visitors to the Philippines

visaTypes.name: Transit Visa (9B)
visaTypes.description: For foreign nationals transiting through the Philippines

visaTypes.name: Seaman's Visa (9C)
visaTypes.description: For foreign seafarers joining vessels in Philippine ports

visaTypes.name: Student Visa (9F)
visaTypes.description: For foreign students enrolled in Philippine educational institutions
minimumRequirements: Police clearance from country of origin

visaTypes.name: Pre-arranged Employment Visa (9G)
visaTypes.description: For foreign nationals with pre-arranged employment in the Philippines
minimumRequirements: Police clearance from country of origin

subtypes.name: Regular 9G Visa
subtypes.description: Standard pre-arranged employment visa for foreign workers
requirements: Police clearance from country of origin

subtypes.name: Executive 9G Visa
subtypes.description: For foreign executives working in the Philippines

businessOwners: Police clearance from country of origin
employees: Police clearance from country of origin

visaTypes.name: Temporary Resident Visa (TRV)
visaTypes.description: For foreign nationals who are temporary residents in the Philippines

visaTypes.name: Treaty Trader or Treaty Investor (9D)
visaTypes.description: For foreign nationals engaged in trade or investment in the Philippines under a treaty
minimumRequirements: Proof of substantial trade or investment

visaTypes.name: Accredited Official of Foreign Government (9E)
visaTypes.description: For foreign government officials accredited to the Philippines

categories.name: Special Visas
categories.description: For foreign nationals eligible for special visa categories in the Philippines

visaTypes.name: Visa Upon Arrival (SEVUA)
visaTypes.description: For foreign nationals eligible for visa issuance upon arrival in the Philippines

visaTypes.name: Special Resident Retiree Visa (SRRV)
visaTypes.description: For foreign retirees who wish to reside permanently or indefinitely in the Philippines
minimumRequirements: Time deposit in an accredited bank

visaTypes.name: Special Investor Resident Visa (SIRV)
visaTypes.description: For foreign investors who invest a minimum amount in the Philippines

visaTypes.name: Special Visa for Employment Generation (SVEG)
visaTypes.description: For foreign nationals who employ at least 10 Filipinos in their business
minimumRequirements: Proof of employment of at least 10 Filipinos

visaTypes.name: Special Employment Visa for Offshore Banking Unit (SEOBU)
visaTypes.description: For foreign employees of offshore banking units in the Philippines
minimumRequirements: Employment contract with offshore banking unit

visaTypes.name: Special Visa under E.O. 226 (SEO226)
visaTypes.description: For foreign nationals investing in the Philippines under the Investment Code

categories.name: Special Permits
categories.description: For foreign nationals requiring special permits for specific activities in the Philippines

visaTypes.name: Special Study Permit
visaTypes.description: For foreign students taking short courses in the Philippines

visaTypes.name: Provisional Work Permit
visaTypes.description: For foreign nationals awaiting approval of their work visa

visaTypes.name: Special Work Permit (Commercial)
visaTypes.description: For foreign nationals working temporarily in the Philippines

visaTypes.name: Special Work Permit (Artists and Athletes)
visaTypes.description: For foreign artists and athletes performing in the Philippines
